author: Vic Austin
comment: This app has all the tools I need to keep up with my investments. I still haven't figured out all it does, but I'm getting there!  Each screen can be customized to show exactly what you want. Its very user friendly - easy to change and easy to navigate.

author: clayton stoltz
comment: I like it a lot! But.... the screener has no input parameters. And the charts a bit non intuitive and lack customization. 3 stars for now but if this app adds screener input fields and a better charting section i would rate it 5+ stars!!! Its a good app all good information except for the lack of the previously mentioned things

author: Steve Myers
comment: The Best Market App I've Ever Used!  But...updates on 10/10/17 and again on 10/11/17 created an error in the News section as images were not displayed for each story. But after deleting the data and cache, app works perfect again.

Better app than most, loaded w/info for stocks,currency & other commodities.  The only recom'd is no ability to toggle betw pages (market/stocks/currency..) But must go fwd or bck 1 the page @ a time.

author: Derek Nagel
comment: Terribly disappointed that this app no longer functions. ZERO markets displayed, I've deleted and reinstalled the app six times and it simply doesn't work.   My  previous 5 star review:  I love that every single world market and commodities prices are displayed perfectly and are very easy to read

I've tried to use the app multiple times today. It has crashed on me every time and lost all my preferences. Up until today it was working great. What happened? Is it because Samsung sent out out a software update to their phones?

Promising but extremely buggy. Bug after bug. Refreshing nightmare. No gfinance integration. No portfolio import. Widget usually empty. Search gives horrible and too many results, many tickers 0 price. Last candle often missing.

author: Dan Finucane
comment: Great information and layout but over the past two weeks or so the app suddenly won't load any data and requires a full uninstall and reinstall to start working again. Within a few hours it acts up again.

author: Anthony P Bibbo Jr
comment: I can't believe it an app that covers so much of the market and doesn't  crash every 5 minutes. I have had a lot of problems with apps but this one is well managed. Keep up the good work.

author: Fahad mohd
comment: An update require regarding which country market is active/inactive. I don't able to figure out so confused.

author: Phillip Sanford
comment: I needed something to give me a quick view of how my small portfolio of shares is doing on a daily-ish basis. This does exactly that and also keeps me updated with news items that may be of interest or use. It's functionality is straightforward and easy to manage. It also provides different "my portfolio" views depending on your preference. For at-a-glance info it is excellent. Haven't noticed any lag even on my humble Moto E 1st gen.

author: Allan Holder
comment: Like the alerts but it's spotty with market updates even on wifi. I don't recommend if you must have real time updates.
Used for tracking a portfolio which it does well.  Source of pricing information causes problems with some aim stocks.

author: Angus Kerr
comment: nice and easy to track stocks. Everything else is generally pointless or unintuitive. How do you set up portfolios?????? Might be a good app, but there are websites that are far easier to use

author: Jaylin Hicks
comment: Best app for individual investors who want to watch the market and establish support, resistance, and channel lines on any stock in your watchlist. It has been so useful to me since I have decided to fully emerge myself into learning about stocks and technical analysis

author: Bob Fallahi
comment: A highly versatile app with a comprehensive set of options to manage and make sense of the huge amount of financial and markets information it offers at the users finger tips. This is a pro app. Please provide separate 'Text Size' option in the Settings menu for news articles.  The news text is too large on my tablet and too small on my phone.
Very complete investment app, a bit complex to get used to it. If you master it, it is a great source of data

author: William Thompson III
comment: This app is comprehensive and everything works well. Other apps that used to do much of the same thing no longer have access to price data and are useless.

author: Hue Lee
comment: Works fine on phone.  Crashes on TV screen.
title: crashes on tv screen

author: Ivaylo Boiadjiev
comment: I only wish the app would be able to work with Canadian mutual funds.  Outside of that, it is perfect to keep your finger on the pulse of markets around the world.

author: Sp Palmer
comment: Like the way its set up and all the information you can get from it also the ability to put sticks your watching on a list to help make a decision about them

author: Carl M.
comment: I think people will agree, it's hard to find financial news.  Great new, data, and market watch all in one place is GREAT!  One tweak that could be made is to allow "screen rotation" to work on this app...please!  This is on a tablet that I use and it's the only app I have to rotate 180 degrees (I turn the tablet 180 degrees), really?... Make that change and you people have made an awesome, useful peice of software!!!  Thanks in advance, CaptainCarl

author: Derek Punch
comment: Google portfolio load doesn't work. Some us mutual funds not available. Response times slow for fixes. Great dsiplays.

This is one of the best,.. possibly the best free app for active market participants available!! It's pretty much a free version of eSignal as an app!! Best way to put it,.. if your a trader you'll understand what I'm saying!!

author: Nick Hart
comment: One of the best market tracking apps I've used. Only gripe is the absence of the FTSE All Share index in UK

author: Eric Winner
comment: This app has a lot of potential but its got a lot of overhead, meaning its very internet connection reliant. Can run slow and always takes at least 5 to 10 seconds to load even when internet connection is excellent.

author: Flashyfinancier
comment: Great app but my most important data, the SP500 is stuck on yesterday's value and wont update!!! Please fix this. Otherwise its gorgeous

author: deoki nandan Choudhary
comment: Add all constituents to watchlist for adding a complete list of index constituents. Export or import to watchlist. Add and edit option in market overview and screener. Kindly, add this feature in mobile app

author: Alex Opio
comment: This is the best market app to keep a close watch on the market movements (with up to date watch list), it covers a wide range of the markets with current financial information... It gives me a strategy to follow in my trading..
fast, simple design. You'll just get what you need. More real-time would be appreciated but it's just nitpicking

author: gib fish
comment: When news alerts pop up and you select it, the ap doesn't go to the article.   You. Have to hunt for the article and  many  times you can't find it.

author: Rupa Nama
comment: will be great if it include technical analysis and the top 10 holdings of each funds plus past historic annual returns of each fund. thank for great app.

author: Kimi Raikkonen
comment: Works as advertised. Doesnt contain annoying ads and doesn't require invasive permissions

author: Nazif Gashi
comment: Really good app my favorite part is the breaking news. Always first. Plus ton of data on stocks.

author: Bill Woo
comment: Not real time. Portfolio and watch lists have last and % change but not last and actual change. Are you kidding?

author: Ian Armitage
comment: A good app, but it would be more helpful to me if data for the New Zealand Stock Exchange (NZX50) was included in the Asia Section. 5-stars if this change is made.

author: Frederick Fayne
comment: I just look at the markets Ups & Downs of it... to see where it's going

author: Mark Andy
comment: Easy on the cellphone battery as best I can tell.  Yahoo app ate my battery way too fast.  This app does not.

author: Tony
comment: Too many search results that have no relevance. Can't tell which one is the proper stock ticker.
I loved it. One thing is update the real time like it should open on 9.30 . Not on 9.45 k.. thanx
